author: vinodkv
msg: YARN-1553. Modified YARN and MR to stop using HttpConfig.isSecure() and
instead rely on the http policy framework. And also fix some bugs related
to https handling in YARN web-apps. Contributed by Haohui Mai.

author: kayyagari
msg: o updated the handler to reuse the methods by passing the appropriate session handle
o used CoreSession to perform the operation
o fixed an issue where password cannot be changed if the old password is hashed
